==Introduction==

This software offers the possibility to synchronize two databases hosted on different servers.

You can transfer all the tables from one to the other or just pick up some fields.

==Requirements==

This software has been tested on Linux (Red Hat Server, Ubuntu) and on Microsoft Windows Server 2003.

If this software does not work with your server, please contact us or [http://code.google.com/p/dbsynchro/issues/entry add an issue].

== Installation ==

First of all, download the last version of the software [http://code.google.com/p/dbsynchro/downloads/list here].

==How to use this program?==

This software is a Java program which should be launched like any jar file.

You must specify both configuration and queries files. Besides, you can specify other option such as the level of the logger.

===Examples===

{{{
java -jar DbSynchro-X.X.jar --config config.xml --queries queries.sql --logger CONFIG
}}}

{{{
java -jar DbSynchro-X.X.jar -c config.xml -q queries.sql
}}}

==Libraries==

Database Synchro Tool uses:
  * [http://code.google.com/p/guava-libraries/ The Guava Libraries]
  * [http://kenai.com/projects/javamail JavaMail]
  * [http://www.mysql.com/downloads/connector/j/ MySQL Connector]
  * [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/sqlserver/aa937724 Microsoft JDBC Driver for SQL Server]
